target.name: travis
target.depends: phpunit, behat, phpcs, phpmd, pdepend, phpdoc, package

target.name: help
target.echo: List of targets: Individual: pdepend Generates software Metrics for PHP phpcb Generates a browsable PHP code where sections with violations are highlighted. phpcpd Copy/Paste Detector phpcs Detects violations of a defined set of coding standards phpdcd Dead Code Detector for PHP code. phpdoc phpDocumentor generates documentation from your source code. phplint Check that you code actually compiles phploc A tool for quickly measuring the size of a project phpmd PHP Mess Detector phpunit Unittesting for php tabtospace Converts tabs to space in all project files behat A php framework for testing your business expectations. Combos: all Runs all targets travis Runs relevant targets on the travis build server
